videos.headline: Romney's 41-yard diving catch sets up BYU TD
videos.description: Zach Wilson runs in for a one-yard touchdown a play after connecting with Gunner Romney for a 41-yard gain.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Romney's 41-yard diving catch sets up BYU TD) 2020/9/26 ESHEET
